path: /Users/arpithaprakash/Capstone/1-2CR CONOPS&DRAWs - Copy/New folder - Copy (16)/Carl G AT4 Conop.pptx

sections.MISSION:
Bull Troop conducts M320, AT4, and Carl G Qualification IVO RNG 105 NLT 08 2359 DEC2024 IOT qualify all soldiers on weapons in preparation for SQDLFX and collective training
Bull Thunder AT4/Carl-G/M320 RNG 105
COMMANDERS
sections.PURPOSE: Prepare Troop for SQD LFX and further collective training
sections.END STATE:
16 Bull Troopers are qualified on Carl G, AT4 and 30 Bull Troopers are qualified on M320
TRAINING OBJECTIVES:
Bull Troopers can accurately and quickly engage the enemy using the M320, Carl G, and AT4
Concurrent Task 6
sections.CONCEPT OF OPERATION:
Planning: LT Smith plan and resources backside support for the range, RSO plans the training in accordance with IWITS strategy
Preparation: On 19NOV RSO back briefs CPT Johnson the training plan during rehearsal and SL’s train the trainer (TL’s) at the range
sections.EXECUTION:
Rifle teams conduct M320 Qualification, AT4 Subcal and Carl G Subcal Qualfiication
Recovery: Participants collect ammo and clean the range. Range is closed out.
sections.TASKS:
TO SUBS:
SGT McClure creates training CONOP NLT 15NOV2024
SGT McClure Rehearses Range plan NLT 19NOV2024 IOT coordinate resources and train the trainer
CORDINATING INSTRUCTIONS:
Rehersal of Concept 26NOV (With Dakota)
sections.COMMAND AND SIGNAL:
P: TSM Radios
A: FM Radios
C: Runner
E: Signal
OIC: LT Smith
RSO: SSG McClure Range Control DSN: 599-1200
